Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of a new synthetic peptide loaded in polylactic acid or poly(lactic-co-glycolic) acid nanoparticles against Pseudomonas aeruginosa, Escherichia coli O157:H7 and methicillin resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA).
Literature.Author: Cruz J, Flórez J, Torres R, Urquiza M, Gutiérrez JA, Guzmán F, Ortiz CC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli O157:H7(MIC50=1.0-10µM),Escherichia coli O157:H7(MBC=50µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC50=1.0-10µM),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MBC=75µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC50=1.0-10µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MBC=>100µM)
